he: וַיַּגִּ֨דוּ עֲבָדָ֤יו לְדָוִד֙ אֶת־הַדְּבָרִ֣ים הָאֵ֔לֶּה וַיִּשַׁ֤ר הַדָּבָר֙ בְּעֵינֵ֣י דָוִ֔ד לְהִתְחַתֵּ֖ן בַּמֶּ֑לֶךְ וְלֹ֥א מָלְא֖וּ הַיָּמִֽים׃
text: When his courtiers told this to David, David was pleased with the idea of becoming the king’s son-in-law. bMeaning of Heb. uncertain.Before the time had expired,-b
versionTitle: Tanakh: The Holy Scriptures, published by JPS
